se.starbox.util

Class PipeToSolr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpipeline.pipeline.stage.Stage
      • se.starbox.util.PipeToSolr

  • public class PipeToSolr
extends org.openpipeline.pipeline.stage.Stage
    A class made as a bridge between OpenPipeline and Solr. PipeToSolr takes the output from OpenPipeline and sends it to Solr.
    Author:
    Linus, Robin
